parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.64

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Pilot Camera

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns model space coordinates of the object airplane or helicopter [[A3_Targeting_config_reference#class_pilotCamera|pilotCamera]] .

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''getPilotCameraPosition''' object

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> object: [[Object]]
</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] - [x,y,z] offset relative to the model centre, format [[PositionRelative]]. Returns [0,0,0] if object has no [[A3_Targeting_config_reference#class_pilotCamera|pilotCamera]].
</value></part><part><name>x1 </name>=<value> <code> _pilotCamPos = '''getPilotCameraPosition''' [[vehicle]] [[player]]</code>
</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[hasPilotCamera]], [[getPilotCameraDirection]], [[getPilotCameraRotation]], [[getPilotCameraTarget]], [[setPilotCameraDirection]], [[setPilotCameraRotation]], [[setPilotCameraTarget]]
</value></part></template></root>
